thread.title: Raheem Sterling and Wilfried Bony fire Manchester City to big win - Milford Mercury
thread.title_full: Raheem Sterling and Wilfried Bony fire Manchester City to big win - Milford Mercury - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Milford Mercury
title: Raheem Sterling and Wilfried Bony fire Manchester City to big win - Milford Mercury
text:
Raheem Sterling hit a first-half hat-trick and Wilfried Bony struck twice as Barclays Premier League leaders Manchester City overcame promoted Bournemouth 5-1 at the Etihad Stadium. City had needed someone to step up in the absence of injured star striker Sergio Aguero and A 49million man Sterling duly rose to the challenge.
 Milford Mercury.
